title: The Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, on the request of Project Proponent/s, by notification in the Official Gazette, may grant to add or delete any area, not exceeding 50% of the total area under Locational Clearance, subject to condition that the remaining area shall not be less than 40 ha
clause_text: The Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, on the request of Project Proponent/s, by notification in the Official Gazette, may grant to add or delete any area, not exceeding 50% of the total area under Locational Clearance, subject to condition that the remaining area shall not be less than 40 ha. The permissible FSI and other parameters shall increase or decrease accordingly.
